fr.ece.ostis.actions.base

Class FollowMeAction

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.ece.ostis.actions.Action
      • fr.ece.ostis.actions.BaseAction
        • fr.ece.ostis.actions.base.FollowMeAction
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    DroneFrameReceivedListener

    public class FollowMeAction
extends BaseAction
implements DroneFrameReceivedListener
    Special action that follows the user, based on a particular color, defined in Tracker. Work left to do is : move code of Tracker here, and call ensureAltitude() periodically.
    Version:
    2014-02-05
    Author:
    Paul Bouillon
